title: The Story of the Statue
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 304 words, Level J (Grade 1), Lexile 510L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     M and P
description: On an island in New York Harbor stands a very big, green, famous lady-the Statue of Liberty! Readers will learn many interesting facts about where she came from and how she was built. They will also learn what she means to the people of the United States. Engaging photographs support the text.
